title: The Lost Scrolls
description: Three scrolls. Three continents. Three demons in pursuit.Jessica wants nothing more than to stay on the protected grounds of the Okefenokee Swamp and plan her wedding, but the spirit of her dead father has other plans and leads her to a wooden chest. Inside the battered antique, an old secret is uncovered, sending Jessica on the adventure of her life.Demons on her trail, an unexpected red-haired rival wanting her dead, and the heartache of leaving her fiance, overshadow Jessica's desire to unravel her twisted family tree.
author: Shelly Goodman Wright
